title: Hardscape Maintenance & Restoration
intro: Protect your investment. Professional cleaning, sealing, and repair for stone and paver surfaces.
highlights: Deep cleaning and pressure washing for removing mold/mildew
Polymeric sand replacement to restabilize pavers
Sealant application to protect against stains and fading
Repair of sunken or shifting paver sections

avgCost.notes: Simple clean-and-seal jobs are lower; larger repairs or restoration projects scale with area.

faqs.q: How often should I seal my patio?
faqs.a: Pros recommend resealing every 2-3 years to protect the color and prevent deep staining from leaves or food.

faqs.q: Can you fix just a few loose pavers?
faqs.a: Yes, specialists handle spot repairs to fix trip hazards without needing to replace the entire patio.
